00079 /* note; image_panel_properties() uses pointer to sima->image directly */
00080 Image *ED_space_image(SpaceImage *sima)
00081 {
00082     return sima->image;
00083 }
00084 
00085 /* called to assign images to UV faces */
00086 void ED_space_image_set(SpaceImage *sima, Scene *scene, Object *obedit, Image *ima)
00087 {
00088     /* context may be NULL, so use global */
00089     ED_uvedit_assign_image(G.main, scene, obedit, ima, sima->image);
00090     
00091     /* change the space ima after because uvedit_face_visible_test uses the space ima
00092      * to check if the face is displayed in UV-localview */
00093     sima->image = ima;
00094     
00095     if (ima == NULL || ima->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT || ima->type == IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE)
00096         sima->flag &= ~SI_DRAWTOOL;
00097     
00098     if (sima->image)
00099         BKE_image_signal(sima->image, &sima->iuser, IMA_SIGNAL_USER_NEW_IMAGE);
00100     
00101     if (sima->image && sima->image->id.us == 0)
00102         sima->image->id.us = 1;
00103     
00104     if (obedit)
00105         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
00106 
00107     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_IMAGE, NULL);
00108 }
00109 
00110 ImBuf *ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(SpaceImage *sima, void **lock_r)
00111 {
00112     ImBuf *ibuf;
00113     
00114     if (sima && sima->image) {
00115 #if 0
00116         if (sima->image->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT && BIF_show_render_spare())
00117             return BIF_render_spare_imbuf();
00118         else
00119 #endif
00120         ibuf = BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(sima->image, &sima->iuser, lock_r);
00121         
00122         if (ibuf && (ibuf->rect || ibuf->rect_float))
00123             return ibuf;
00124     }
00125     
00126     return NULL;
00127 }
00128 
00129 void ED_space_image_release_buffer(SpaceImage *sima, void *lock)
00130 {
00131     if (sima && sima->image)
00132         BKE_image_release_ibuf(sima->image, lock);
00133 }
00134 
00135 int ED_space_image_has_buffer(SpaceImage *sima)
00136 {
00137     ImBuf *ibuf;
00138     void *lock;
00139     int has_buffer;
00140     
00141     ibuf = ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(sima, &lock);
00142     has_buffer = (ibuf != NULL);
00143     ED_space_image_release_buffer(sima, lock);
00144     
00145     return has_buffer;
00146 }
00147 
00148 void ED_image_size(Image *ima, int *width, int *height)
00149 {
00150     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
00151     void *lock;
00152     
00153     if (ima)
00154         ibuf = BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(ima, NULL, &lock);
00155     
00156     if (ibuf && ibuf->x > 0 && ibuf->y > 0) {
00157         *width = ibuf->x;
00158         *height = ibuf->y;
00159     }
00160     else {
00161         *width = 256;
00162         *height = 256;
00163     }
00164     
00165     if (ima)
00166         BKE_image_release_ibuf(ima, lock);
00167 }
00168 
00169 void ED_space_image_size(SpaceImage *sima, int *width, int *height)
00170 {
00171     Scene *scene = sima->iuser.scene;
00172     ImBuf *ibuf;
00173     void *lock;
00174     
00175     ibuf = ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(sima, &lock);
00176     
00177     if (ibuf && ibuf->x > 0 && ibuf->y > 0) {
00178         *width = ibuf->x;
00179         *height = ibuf->y;
00180     }
00181     else if (sima->image && sima->image->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT && scene) {
00182         /* not very important, just nice */
00183         *width = (scene->r.xsch * scene->r.size) / 100;
00184         *height = (scene->r.ysch * scene->r.size) / 100;
00185 
00186         if ((scene->r.mode & R_BORDER) && (scene->r.mode & R_CROP)) {
00187             *width *= (scene->r.border.xmax - scene->r.border.xmin);
00188             *height *= (scene->r.border.ymax - scene->r.border.ymin);
00189         }
00190 
00191     }
00192     /* I know a bit weak... but preview uses not actual image size */
00193     // XXX else if (image_preview_active(sima, width, height));
00194     else {
00195         *width = 256;
00196         *height = 256;
00197     }
00198     
00199     ED_space_image_release_buffer(sima, lock);
00200 }
00201 
00202 void ED_image_aspect(Image *ima, float *aspx, float *aspy)
00203 {
00204     *aspx = *aspy = 1.0;
00205     
00206     if ((ima == NULL) || (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT) || (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE) ||
00207         (ima->aspx == 0.0f || ima->aspy == 0.0f))
00208         return;
00209     
00210     /* x is always 1 */
00211     *aspy = ima->aspy / ima->aspx;
00212 }
00213 
00214 void ED_space_image_aspect(SpaceImage *sima, float *aspx, float *aspy)
00215 {
00216     ED_image_aspect(ED_space_image(sima), aspx, aspy);
00217 }
00218 
00219 void ED_space_image_zoom(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar, float *zoomx, float *zoomy)
00220 {
00221     int width, height;
00222     
00223     ED_space_image_size(sima, &width, &height);
00224     
00225     *zoomx = (float)(ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin + 1) / (float)((ar->v2d.cur.xmax - ar->v2d.cur.xmin) * width);
00226     *zoomy = (float)(ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin + 1) / (float)((ar->v2d.cur.ymax - ar->v2d.cur.ymin) * height);
00227 }
00228 
00229 void ED_space_image_uv_aspect(SpaceImage *sima, float *aspx, float *aspy)
00230 {
00231     int w, h;
00232     
00233     ED_space_image_aspect(sima, aspx, aspy);
00234     ED_space_image_size(sima, &w, &h);
00235 
00236     *aspx *= (float)w;
00237     *aspy *= (float)h;
00238     
00239     if (*aspx < *aspy) {
00240         *aspy = *aspy / *aspx;
00241         *aspx = 1.0f;
00242     }
00243     else {
00244         *aspx = *aspx / *aspy;
00245         *aspy = 1.0f;
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 void ED_image_uv_aspect(Image *ima, float *aspx, float *aspy)
00250 {
00251     int w, h;
00252     
00253     ED_image_aspect(ima, aspx, aspy);
00254     ED_image_size(ima, &w, &h);
00255     
00256     *aspx *= (float)w;
00257     *aspy *= (float)h;
00258 }
00259 
00260 int ED_space_image_show_render(SpaceImage *sima)
00261 {
00262     return (sima->image && ELEM(sima->image->type, IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT, IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE));
00263 }
00264 
00265 int ED_space_image_show_paint(SpaceImage *sima)
00266 {
00267     if (ED_space_image_show_render(sima))
00268         return 0;
00269     
00270     return (sima->flag & SI_DRAWTOOL);
00271 }
00272 
00273 int ED_space_image_show_uvedit(SpaceImage *sima, Object *obedit)
00274 {
00275     if (sima && (ED_space_image_show_render(sima) || ED_space_image_show_paint(sima)))
00276         return 0;
00277 
00278     if (obedit && obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00279         struct BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00280         int ret;
00281         
00282         ret = EDBM_mtexpoly_check(em);
00283         
00284         return ret;
00285     }
00286     
00287     return 0;
00288 }
00289 
00290 int ED_space_image_show_uvshadow(SpaceImage *sima, Object *obedit)
00291 {
00292     if (ED_space_image_show_render(sima))
00293         return 0;
00294     
00295     if (ED_space_image_show_paint(sima))
00296         if (obedit && obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00297             struct BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00298             int ret;
00299             
00300             ret = EDBM_mtexpoly_check(em);
00301             
00302             return ret;
00303         }
00304     
00305     return 0;
00306 }

00308 
00309 static void image_scopes_tag_refresh(ScrArea *sa)
00310 {
00311     SpaceImage *sima = (SpaceImage *)sa->spacedata.first;
00312     ARegion *ar;
00313 
00314     /* only while histogram is visible */
00315     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00316         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW && ar->flag & RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN)
00317             return;
00318     }
00319 
00320     sima->scopes.ok = 0;
00321 }

00324 /* ******************** manage regions ********************* */
00325 
00326 ARegion *image_has_buttons_region(ScrArea *sa)
00327 {
00328     ARegion *ar, *arnew;
00329 
00330     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_UI);
00331     if (ar) return ar;
00332     
00333     /* add subdiv level; after header */
00334     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_HEADER);
00335 
00336     /* is error! */
00337     if (ar == NULL) return NULL;
00338     
00339     arnew = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "buttons for image");
00340     
00341     BLI_insertlinkafter(&sa->regionbase, ar, arnew);
00342     arnew->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_UI;
00343     arnew->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_LEFT;
00344     
00345     arnew->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00346     
00347     return arnew;
00348 }
00349 
00350 ARegion *image_has_scope_region(ScrArea *sa)
00351 {
00352     ARegion *ar, *arnew;
00353 
00354     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW);
00355     if (ar) return ar;
00356 
00357     /* add subdiv level; after buttons */
00358     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_UI);
00359 
00360     /* is error! */
00361     if (ar == NULL) return NULL;
00362     
00363     arnew = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "scopes for image");
00364     
00365     BLI_insertlinkafter(&sa->regionbase, ar, arnew);
00366     arnew->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW;
00367     arnew->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_RIGHT;
00368     
00369     arnew->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00370 
00371     image_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00372     
00373     return arnew;
00374 }

00376 /* ******************** default callbacks for image space ***************** */
00377 
00378 static SpaceLink *image_new(const bContext *UNUSED(C))
00379 {
00380     ARegion *ar;
00381     SpaceImage *simage;
00382     
00383     simage = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceImage), "initimage");
00384     simage->spacetype = SPACE_IMAGE;
00385     simage->zoom = 1;
00386     simage->lock = 1;
00387 
00388     simage->iuser.ok = 1;
00389     simage->iuser.fie_ima = 2;
00390     simage->iuser.frames = 100;
00391     
00392     scopes_new(&simage->scopes);
00393     simage->sample_line_hist.height = 100;
00394 
00395     /* header */
00396     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "header for image");
00397     
00398     BLI_addtail(&simage->regionbase, ar);
00399     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00400     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM;
00401     
00402     /* buttons/list view */
00403     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "buttons for image");
00404     
00405     BLI_addtail(&simage->regionbase, ar);
00406     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_UI;
00407     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_LEFT;
00408     ar->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00409     
00410     /* scopes */
00411     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "buttons for image");
00412     
00413     BLI_addtail(&simage->regionbase, ar);
00414     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW;
00415     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_RIGHT;
00416     ar->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00417 
00418     /* main area */
00419     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "main area for image");
00420     
00421     BLI_addtail(&simage->regionbase, ar);
00422     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00423     
00424     return (SpaceLink *)simage;
00425 }
00426 
00427 /* not spacelink itself */
00428 static void image_free(SpaceLink *sl)
00429 {   
00430     SpaceImage *simage = (SpaceImage *) sl;
00431     
00432     if (simage->cumap)
00433         curvemapping_free(simage->cumap);
00434     scopes_free(&simage->scopes);
00435 }

00438 /* spacetype; init callback, add handlers */
00439 static void image_init(struct wmWindowManager *UNUSED(wm), ScrArea *sa)
00440 {
00441     ListBase *lb = WM_dropboxmap_find("Image", SPACE_IMAGE, 0);
00442 
00443     /* add drop boxes */
00444     WM_event_add_dropbox_handler(&sa->handlers, lb);
00445     
00446 }
00447 
00448 static SpaceLink *image_duplicate(SpaceLink *sl)
00449 {
00450     SpaceImage *simagen = MEM_dupallocN(sl);
00451     
00452     /* clear or remove stuff from old */
00453     if (simagen->cumap)
00454         simagen->cumap = curvemapping_copy(simagen->cumap);
00455 
00456     scopes_new(&simagen->scopes);
00457 
00458     return (SpaceLink *)simagen;
00459 }

00496 static void image_keymap(struct wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00497 {
00498     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Image Generic", SPACE_IMAGE, 0);
00499     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00500     int i;
00501     
00502     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_new", NKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00503     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_open", OKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00504     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_reload", RKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00505     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_save", SKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00506     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_save_as", F3KEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00507     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_properties", NKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00508     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_scopes", TKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00509 
00510     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_cycle_render_slot", JKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00511     RNA_boolean_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_cycle_render_slot", JKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0)->ptr, "reverse", TRUE);
00512     
00513     keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Image", SPACE_IMAGE, 0);
00514     
00515     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_all", HOMEKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00516     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_selected", PADPERIOD, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00517     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_pan", MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00518     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_pan", MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00519     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_pan", MOUSEPAN, 0, 0, 0);
00520 
00521     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_all", NDOF_BUTTON_FIT, KM_PRESS, 0, 0); // or view selected?
00522     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_ndof", NDOF_MOTION, 0, 0, 0);
00523 
00524     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_in", WHEELINMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00525     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_out", WHEELOUTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00526     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_in", PADPLUSKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00527     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_out", PADMINUS, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00528     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom", MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00529     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom", MOUSEZOOM, 0, 0, 0);
00530 
00531     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD8, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 8.0f);
00532     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD4, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 4.0f);
00533     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD2, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 2.0f);
00534     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD1, KM_PRESS, 0, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 1.0f);
00535     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD2, KM_PRESS, 0, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 0.5f);
00536     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD4, KM_PRESS, 0, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 0.25f);
00537     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD8, KM_PRESS, 0, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 0.125f);
00538 
00539     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_sample", ACTIONMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00540     RNA_enum_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_curves_point_set", ACTIONMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0)->ptr, "point", 0);
00541     RNA_enum_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "IMAGE_OT_curves_point_set", ACTIONMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0)->ptr, "point", 1);
00542 
00543     /* toggle editmode is handy to have while UV unwrapping */
00544     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OBJECT_OT_mode_set", TABKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00545     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "mode", OB_MODE_EDIT);
00546     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "toggle", TRUE);
00547 
00548     /* fast switch to render slots */
00549     for (i = 0; i < MAX2(IMA_MAX_RENDER_SLOT, 9); i++) {
00550         kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_context_set_int", ONEKEY+i, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00551         RNA_string_set(kmi->ptr, "data_path", "space_data.image.render_slot");
00552         RNA_int_set(kmi->ptr, "value", i);
00553     }
00554 }
00555 
00556 /* dropboxes */
00557 static int image_drop_poll(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmDrag *drag, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00558 {
00559     if (drag->type == WM_DRAG_PATH)
00560         if (ELEM3(drag->icon, 0, ICON_FILE_IMAGE, ICON_FILE_BLANK)) /* rule might not work? */
00561             return 1;
00562     return 0;
00563 }
00564 
00565 static void image_drop_copy(wmDrag *drag, wmDropBox *drop)
00566 {
00567     /* copy drag path to properties */
00568     RNA_string_set(drop->ptr, "filepath", drag->path);
00569 }
00570 
00571 /* area+region dropbox definition */
00572 static void image_dropboxes(void)
00573 {
00574     ListBase *lb = WM_dropboxmap_find("Image", SPACE_IMAGE, 0);
00575     
00576     WM_dropbox_add(lb, "IMAGE_OT_open", image_drop_poll, image_drop_copy);
00577 }
00578 
00579 
00580 
00581 static void image_refresh(const bContext *C, ScrArea *UNUSED(sa))
00582 {
00583     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00584     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00585     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00586     Image *ima;
00587 
00588     ima = ED_space_image(sima);
00589 
00590     if (sima->iuser.flag & IMA_ANIM_ALWAYS)
00591         BKE_image_user_calc_frame(&sima->iuser, scene->r.cfra, 0);
00592     
00593     /* check if we have to set the image from the editmesh */
00594     if (ima && (ima->source == IMA_SRC_VIEWER || sima->pin)) ;
00595     else if (obedit && obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00596         Mesh *me = (Mesh *)obedit->data;
00597         struct BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00598         int sloppy = 1; /* partially selected face is ok */
00599 
00600         if (scene_use_new_shading_nodes(scene)) {
00601             /* new shading system, get image from material */
00602             BMFace *efa = BM_active_face_get(em->bm, sloppy);
00603 
00604             if (efa) {
00605                 Image *node_ima;
00606                 ED_object_get_active_image(obedit, efa->mat_nr + 1, &node_ima, NULL, NULL);
00607 
00608                 if (node_ima)
00609                     sima->image = node_ima;
00610             }
00611         }
00612         else {
00613             /* old shading system, we set texface */
00614             MTexPoly *tf;
00615             
00616             if (em && EDBM_mtexpoly_check(em)) {
00617                 sima->image = NULL;
00618                 
00619                 tf = EDBM_mtexpoly_active_get(em, NULL, TRUE); /* partially selected face is ok */
00620                 
00621                 if (tf) {
00622                     /* don't need to check for pin here, see above */
00623                     sima->image = tf->tpage;
00624                     
00625                     if (sima->flag & SI_EDITTILE) ;
00626                     else sima->curtile = tf->tile;
00627                 }
00628             }
00629         }
00630     }
00631 }
00632 
00633 static void image_listener(ScrArea *sa, wmNotifier *wmn)
00634 {
00635     SpaceImage *sima = (SpaceImage *)sa->spacedata.first;
00636     
00637     /* context changes */
00638     switch (wmn->category) {
00639         case NC_SCENE:
00640             switch (wmn->data) {
00641                 case ND_FRAME:
00642                     image_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00643                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00644                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);                 
00645                     break;
00646                 case ND_MODE:
00647                 case ND_RENDER_RESULT:
00648                 case ND_COMPO_RESULT:
00649                     if (ED_space_image_show_render(sima))
00650                         image_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00651                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00652                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);                 
00653                     break;
00654             }
00655             break;
00656         case NC_IMAGE:
00657             if (wmn->reference == sima->image || !wmn->reference) {
00658                 image_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00659                 ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00660                 ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00661             }
00662             break;
00663         case NC_SPACE:  
00664             if (wmn->data == ND_SPACE_IMAGE) {
00665                 image_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00666                 ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00667             }
00668             break;
00669         case NC_GEOM:
00670             switch (wmn->data) {
00671                 case ND_DATA:
00672                 case ND_SELECT:
00673                     image_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00674                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00675                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00676                     break;
00677             }
00678         case NC_OBJECT:
00679         {
00680             Object *ob = (Object *)wmn->reference;
00681             switch (wmn->data) {
00682                 case ND_TRANSFORM:
00683                 case ND_MODIFIER:
00684                     if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_EDIT) && sima->lock && (sima->flag & SI_DRAWSHADOW)) {
00685                         ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00686                         ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00687                     }
00688                     break;
00689             }
00690         }
00691     }
00692 }
00693 
00694 const char *image_context_dir[] = {"edit_image", NULL};
00695 
00696 static int image_context(const bContext *C, const char *member, bContextDataResult *result)
00697 {
00698     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00699 
00700     if (CTX_data_dir(member)) {
00701         CTX_data_dir_set(result, image_context_dir);
00702     }
00703     else if (CTX_data_equals(member, "edit_image")) {
00704         CTX_data_id_pointer_set(result, (ID *)ED_space_image(sima));
00705         return 1;
00706     }
00707 
00708     return 0;
00709 }
00710 
00711 /************************** main region ***************************/
00712 
00713 /* sets up the fields of the View2D from zoom and offset */
00714 static void image_main_area_set_view2d(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar)
00715 {
00716     Image *ima = ED_space_image(sima);
00717     float x1, y1, w, h;
00718     int width, height, winx, winy;
00719     
00720 #if 0
00721     if (image_preview_active(curarea, &width, &height)) ;
00722     else
00723 #endif
00724     ED_space_image_size(sima, &width, &height);
00725 
00726     w = width;
00727     h = height;
00728     
00729     if (ima)
00730         h *= ima->aspy / ima->aspx;
00731 
00732     winx = ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin + 1;
00733     winy = ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin + 1;
00734         
00735     ar->v2d.tot.xmin = 0;
00736     ar->v2d.tot.ymin = 0;
00737     ar->v2d.tot.xmax = w;
00738     ar->v2d.tot.ymax = h;
00739     
00740     ar->v2d.mask.xmin = ar->v2d.mask.ymin = 0;
00741     ar->v2d.mask.xmax = winx;
00742     ar->v2d.mask.ymax = winy;
00743 
00744     /* which part of the image space do we see? */
00745     x1 = ar->winrct.xmin + (winx - sima->zoom * w) / 2.0f;
00746     y1 = ar->winrct.ymin + (winy - sima->zoom * h) / 2.0f;
00747 
00748     x1 -= sima->zoom * sima->xof;
00749     y1 -= sima->zoom * sima->yof;
00750     
00751     /* relative display right */
00752     ar->v2d.cur.xmin = ((ar->winrct.xmin - (float)x1) / sima->zoom);
00753     ar->v2d.cur.xmax = ar->v2d.cur.xmin + ((float)winx / sima->zoom);
00754     
00755     /* relative display left */
00756     ar->v2d.cur.ymin = ((ar->winrct.ymin - (float)y1) / sima->zoom);
00757     ar->v2d.cur.ymax = ar->v2d.cur.ymin + ((float)winy / sima->zoom);
00758     
00759     /* normalize 0.0..1.0 */
00760     ar->v2d.cur.xmin /= w;
00761     ar->v2d.cur.xmax /= w;
00762     ar->v2d.cur.ymin /= h;
00763     ar->v2d.cur.ymax /= h;
00764 }
00765 
00766 /* add handlers, stuff you only do once or on area/region changes */
00767 static void image_main_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00768 {
00769     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00770     
00771     // image space manages own v2d
00772     // UI_view2d_region_reinit(&ar->v2d, V2D_COMMONVIEW_STANDARD, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00773 
00774     /* image paint polls for mode */
00775     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Image Paint", 0, 0);
00776     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00777 
00778     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "UV Editor", 0, 0);
00779     WM_event_add_keymap_handler(&ar->handlers, keymap);
00780     
00781     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "UV Sculpt", 0, 0);
00782     WM_event_add_keymap_handler(&ar->handlers, keymap);
00783 
00784     /* own keymaps */
00785     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Image Generic", SPACE_IMAGE, 0);
00786     WM_event_add_keymap_handler(&ar->handlers, keymap);
00787     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Image", SPACE_IMAGE, 0);
00788     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00789 
00790 }
00791 
00792 static void image_main_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00793 {
00794     /* draw entirely, view changes should be handled here */
00795     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00796     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00797     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00798     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00799     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00800     //View2DScrollers *scrollers;
00801     float col[3];
00802     
00803     /* XXX not supported yet, disabling for now */
00804     scene->r.scemode &= ~R_COMP_CROP;
00805     
00806     /* clear and setup matrix */
00807     UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_BACK, col);
00808     glClearColor(col[0], col[1], col[2], 0.0);
00809     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00810 
00811     /* put scene context variable in iuser */
00812     sima->iuser.scene = scene;
00813 
00814     /* we set view2d from own zoom and offset each time */
00815     image_main_area_set_view2d(sima, ar);
00816     
00817     /* we draw image in pixelspace */
00818     draw_image_main(sima, ar, scene);
00819 
00820     /* and uvs in 0.0-1.0 space */
00821     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
00822     draw_uvedit_main(sima, ar, scene, obedit, obact);
00823 
00824     ED_region_draw_cb_draw(C, ar, REGION_DRAW_POST_VIEW);
00825         
00826     /* Grease Pencil too (in addition to UV's) */
00827     draw_image_grease_pencil((bContext *)C, 1); 
00828 
00829     UI_view2d_view_restore(C);
00830 
00831     /* draw Grease Pencil - screen space only */
00832     draw_image_grease_pencil((bContext *)C, 0);
00833     
00834     /* scrollers? */
00835 #if 0
00836     scrollers = UI_view2d_scrollers_calc(C, v2d, V2D_UNIT_VALUES, V2D_GRID_CLAMP, V2D_ARG_DUMMY, V2D_ARG_DUMMY);
00837     UI_view2d_scrollers_draw(C, v2d, scrollers);
00838     UI_view2d_scrollers_free(scrollers);
00839 #endif
00840 }

00849             break;
00850     }

00871 static void image_buttons_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00872 {
00873     /* context changes */
00874     switch (wmn->category) {
00875         case NC_SCREEN:
00876             if (wmn->data == ND_GPENCIL)
00877                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00878             break;
00879         case NC_BRUSH:
00880             if (wmn->action == NA_EDITED)
00881                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00882             break;
00883         case NC_TEXTURE:
00884         case NC_MATERIAL:
00885             /* sending by texture render job and needed to properly update displaying
00886              * brush texture icon */
00887             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00888             break;
00889     }
00890 }

00904 
00905 static void image_scope_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00906 {
00907     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00908     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00909     void *lock;
00910     ImBuf *ibuf = ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(sima, &lock);
00911     if (ibuf) {
00912         scopes_update(&sima->scopes, ibuf, scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT);
00913     }
00914     ED_space_image_release_buffer(sima, lock);
00915     
00916     ED_region_panels(C, ar, 1, NULL, -1);
00917 }
00918 
00919 static void image_scope_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00920 {
00921     /* context changes */
00922     switch (wmn->category) {
00923         case NC_SCENE:
00924             switch (wmn->data) {
00925                 case ND_MODE:
00926                 case ND_RENDER_RESULT:
00927                 case ND_COMPO_RESULT:
00928                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00929                     break;
00930             }
00931             break;
00932         case NC_IMAGE:
00933             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00934             break;
00935         case NC_NODE:
00936             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00937             break;
00938             
00939     }
00940 }

00978 /**************************** spacetype *****************************/
00979 
00980 /* only called once, from space/spacetypes.c */
00981 void ED_spacetype_image(void)
00982 {
00983     SpaceType *st = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceType), "spacetype image");
00984     ARegionType *art;
00985     
00986     st->spaceid = SPACE_IMAGE;
00987     strncpy(st->name, "Image", BKE_ST_MAXNAME);
00988     
00989     st->new = image_new;
00990     st->free = image_free;
00991     st->init = image_init;
00992     st->duplicate = image_duplicate;
00993     st->operatortypes = image_operatortypes;
00994     st->keymap = image_keymap;
00995     st->dropboxes = image_dropboxes;
00996     st->refresh = image_refresh;
00997     st->listener = image_listener;
00998     st->context = image_context;
00999     
01000     /* regions: main window */
01001     art = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype image region");
01002     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
01003     art->keymapflag = ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES | ED_KEYMAP_GPENCIL;
01004     art->init = image_main_area_init;
01005     art->draw = image_main_area_draw;
01006     art->listener = image_main_area_listener;
01007 
01008     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
01009     
01010     /* regions: listview/buttons */
01011     art = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype image region");
01012     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_UI;
01013     art->prefsizex = 220; // XXX
01014     art->keymapflag = ED_KEYMAP_UI | ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES;
01015     art->listener = image_buttons_area_listener;
01016     art->init = image_buttons_area_init;
01017     art->draw = image_buttons_area_draw;
01018     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
01019 
01020     image_buttons_register(art);
01021     ED_uvedit_buttons_register(art);
01022     
01023     /* regions: statistics/scope buttons */
01024     art = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype image region");
01025     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW;
01026     art->prefsizex = 220; // XXX
01027     art->keymapflag = ED_KEYMAP_UI | ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES;
01028     art->listener = image_scope_area_listener;
01029     art->init = image_scope_area_init;
01030     art->draw = image_scope_area_draw;
01031     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
01032 
01033     /* regions: header */
01034     art = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype image region");
01035     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
01036     art->prefsizey = HEADERY;
01037     art->keymapflag = ED_KEYMAP_UI | ED_KEYMAP_VIEW2D | ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES | ED_KEYMAP_HEADER;
01038     art->listener = image_header_area_listener;
01039     art->init = image_header_area_init;
01040     art->draw = image_header_area_draw;
01041     
01042     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
01043     
01044     BKE_spacetype_register(st);
01045 }
